title: Atheist Chaplain, Christian Secularism, Lots of Metaphors. PVK Q/A Sept 10 2021
description:
0:00:15  Intro
0:02:00  Is being an atheist a deal breaker for becoming a Chaplain?
0:30:15  What is the Alpha course in churches?
0:38:25 Is Tom Holland’s argument at odds with C.S. Lewis’ innate moral knowledge in humans?
1:00:05  What does PVK think about Rubicon by Tom Holland?
1:04:45  Can certain effective storytelling types of translations of the Bible diminish it’s nuance?
1:17:00  What are PVK’s thoughts on video games are “spiritual opium?”
1:21:55  How can each good deed be selfless if our ultimate goal is salvation?
1:29:45  How can I better put faith in God’s plan with me?
1:46:40  Will there be PVK merchandise?
1:55:00  Is shopping mall culture the corporate model for the mega church? 
1:57:02  How tightly should I cling to things and is it necessary for church to collapse?
2:06:10  What is church responsibility in speaking out against evil?
2:11:30  How to guard against undermining your belief?
2:15:45  How to evaluate whether an ideal is adopted as a goal?
2:24:45  is estuary the reintroduction of critique in the church?
2:27:05  Finale / End of transmission

Mostly weekly question and answer livestream. 

Questions are taken from the Bridges of Meaning Discord Server. You may submit questions in writing here https://discord.gg/55yVvXbR or join the Voice Chat room for live interactions there.
